main.name: Uttamkumar Tarasariya
main.description: Data Scientist, Reader & Developer. Freelancing as a Machine Learning Engineer and Solving Business Problems using Artificial Intelligence Modeling
main.bioSpecialty: Uttamkumar, Certified AWS MACHINE LEARNING SPECIALIST, considers himself as the best reader. I am experienced Machine Learning Engineer and have been in this field since 2017. I am also Mobile Developer as I am X-Employee of PlanetX Technologies Pvt. Ltd for 2 years. I have always been passionate about how Software can add value to almost any situation and environment. Therefore, whenever I can, I allocate time to continue training in Software development, as well as in product ideation, discovery, and definition.
main.bioDream: Currently, I am freelancing for full time as a Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Engineer. I am passionate about AI/ML applications which help the business to grow more with the Smart AI and AI Powered automate processes. I would love to assist Start-ups businesses to implement AI Powered systems with the help of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and latest of Artificial Intelligence.

testimonials.text: Uttamkumar really cares about his work, and he goes the extra mile to make sure the project is successful. I would recommend working with him for any machine learning or data science project!
Excellent work, great communication and got work done very quickly and with very high quality. Highly recommended!
